member.summary: The panel is fully collapsed. It can be expanded by calling the method.

member.summary: The panel is expanding horizontally. It can be collapsed by calling the method.

member.name: F:FontEffectsLib.SpriteTypes.Panel.PanelState.ExpandingVertically
member.summary: The panel is finished expanding horizontally, and is now expanding vertically. It can be collapsed by calling the method.

member.name: F:FontEffectsLib.SpriteTypes.Panel.PanelState.Open
member.summary: The panel is fully expanded. It can be collapsed by calling the method.

member.name: F:FontEffectsLib.SpriteTypes.Panel.PanelState.CollapsingVertically
member.summary: The panel is collapsing vertically. It can be expanded by calling the method.

member.name: F:FontEffectsLib.SpriteTypes.Panel.PanelState.CollapsingHorizontally
member.summary: The panel is finished collapsing vertically, and is now collapsing horizontally. It can be expanded by calling the method.

member.summary: Reset the font to its initial state.

member.name: M:FontEffectsLib.FontTypes.SlidingFont.Slide
member.summary: Sets the font to visible and begins sliding towards the target position.

member.name: P:FontEffectsLib.FontTypes.SlidingFont.TargetPosition
member.summary: Gets or sets the target position (the position to slide to).

member.name: P:FontEffectsLib.FontTypes.SlidingFont.SlideSpeed
member.summary: Gets or sets the distance to slide.
member.remarks: The distance slided is calculated by multiplying the unit vector representing the direction from the position to the target positon by this speed by the time (in seconds) elapsed since the last frame. This value is further multiplied by the remaining distance to the target position. The final value is the distance that the sliding font moves forward.

member.name: P:FontEffectsLib.FontTypes.SlidingFont.TargetTolerance
member.summary: Gets or sets the distance from the target position at which the will be considered as done moving.

member.summary: Creates a new . At least one pair of monitored State and Type is required. More can be added to the

Type of value being monitored, Example: typeof([enum]).

The of items to add to this .

member.summary: Removes the specified object from this .
member.param: The item to remove from this .

member.name: E:FontEffectsLib.CoreTypes.StatefulSequence`1.ItemReachedMonitoredState
member.summary: This event is fired whenever any of the objects in this reach the monitored state.

member.name: E:FontEffectsLib.CoreTypes.StatefulSequence`1.SequenceReachedMonitoredState
member.summary: This event is fired when all objects in this reached their monitored states.

member.name: P:FontEffectsLib.CoreTypes.StatefulSequence`1.MonitoredStates
member.summary: Gets a dictionary which stores monitored states and their types. Using an implementation ensures only one state being monitored per type.

member.name: P:FontEffectsLib.CoreTypes.StatefulSequence`1.StateEqualityComparer
member.summary: Gets or sets an equality comparer that is used for comparing object states. When this comparer determines that an object's state has changed to its monitored state, the appropriate events will be fired and actions will be taken. If this value is set to null, the default state equality comparer will be used. The default state equality comparer compares state objects by comparing their string implementations and delegating the hash code computation to the objects themselves. The hash code functionality of this object is not used internally.

member.name: T:FontEffectsLib.CoreTypes.StatefulSequence`1.MonitoredStateReached`1
member.summary: This event delegate is raised whenever any of the objects in this reach the monitored state.
member.typeparam: An object type that supports the interface.
member.param: The object that caused the event to be raised.

member.name: T:FontEffectsLib.CoreTypes.StatefulSequence`1.MonitoredStateReached
member.summary: This event delegate is raised when all objects in this reached their monitored states.

member.summary: Schedule a task to execute at a future time once. The task may be passed a user state parameter.
member.typeparam: The type of the user state parameter.
member.param: The time from now at which to execute the task.
The task to execute.
The user state to pass to the delegate task.

member.name: M:FontEffectsLib.CoreTypes.TaskSchedulerComponent.Update(Microsoft.Xna.Framework.GameTime)
member.summary: Allows the game component to update itself, running any scheduled tasks that are due to be ran.
member.param: Provides a snapshot of timing values.
